characters.description: Plays a bowed string instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Wolfgang Canter in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Plays a plucked string instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Octavia Melody in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster. Shares his color scheme with Noteworthy and Astro Pony.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Plays a brass instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Parish Nandermane in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster.

characters.name: S04E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: A bearded stallion who appears in Somepony to Watch Over Me and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. His cutie mark is three lilypads. A texture matching him has been included in the Gameloft mobile game's type04_master_01.pvr file.

characters.name: S04E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: A bearded stallion who appears at a table with "Duce Switchell" in Somepony to Watch Over Me. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Resembles "Theodore Donald "Donny" Kerabatsos" except for cutie mark, beard, and mane style. His cutie mark is a green snake.

characters.name: S04E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Sweetie Belle's dream in For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils. Shares his design, eye color, and accessory design with "Star Gazer".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith and Equestria Games. Shares his design from an angle with Uncle Orange, shares his mane style from an angle with S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1, and shares his design from the front with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and others. His cutie mark is a blue leaf.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears suffering from mane loss in Leap of Faith.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears suffering from terrible tonsillitis in Leap of Faith. Shares one of his designs with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark switches between a laurel wreath, a horseshoe, and three four-leaf clovers.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears with an almost-hairless tail in Leap of Faith. Shares one of his mane styles with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark switches between a mouse and an apple.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears suffering from swollen hindquarters in Leap of Faith and Where the Apple Lies. Shares one of his designs with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark is a boot, the same as that of "Welly".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears suffering from swollen hooves in Leap of Faith. Shares his design with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark is a dark-colored G-clef.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears suffering from the Clydesdale fur blight in a picture in Leap of Faith. Has similar coat and mane colors to "Black Stone".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears suffering from horsentery in a picture in Leap of Faith. His cutie mark is a bone.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is a dolphin.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is two dolphins, the same as that of Sea Swirl.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is three drops of water.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12. His cutie mark is a group of seven bubbles, the same as that of Derpy.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and shares his coat and mane colors with Mane Moon.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! and at a train station in an alternate timeline in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his color scheme with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #17, and resembles G1 Ice Crystal. His cutie mark (hidden while he carries a bag but visible while he carries a box and lantern) is three brilliant-cut silver-colored gemstones.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and hat with "Bushel", shares his design and eye color with "Apple Slice", and shares his design and hat design with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6. His cutie mark is two pairs of eighth notes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, mane colors, cutie mark, and hat design with "Bushel", shares his design and hat design with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and shares his design with "Apple Slice". His cutie mark is a bucket.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design and eye color with Crusoe Palm and S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his design and cutie mark design with Felix, shares his design with Goldengrape and Noteworthy, and shares his coat and mane colors and cutie mark with Buddy. His cutie mark is three blue clovers.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design and mane color with Royal Riff, and shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and accessories with Half Baked Apple, and shares his coat and mane colors and cutie mark with Crusoe Palm. His cutie mark is a palm tree.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, twice at once with different coat colors and cutie marks, and in Manehattan in The Gift of the Maud Pie. Shares his design, eye color, and accessory with Apple Split. One of his cutie marks is two pairs of backwards-facing eighth notes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and outfit design with Davenport. His cutie mark is a gem.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between Pegasus Emerald Green and pink-coated White Lightning, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, in Road to Friendship, and in The Washouts. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, Golden Delicious, Wensley, BeauDe Mane, and Upper East Stride, and has a similar color scheme to Open Skies.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his mane style with Doctor Horse, S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, and "Gary Coronet", and has a similar color scheme to Apple Cider.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, next to Royal Pin. His cutie mark is a yellow horseshoe.

characters.name: S04E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Appleloosa in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 and is appearing in My Little Pony The Movie. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and shares his coat and mane colors with Apple Cobbler and "Cinnamon Sugar".

characters.name:
Delivery Pony
M2 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Rainbow Rocks as a pony delivering books from Princess Celestia to the Castle of Friendship's new library. Shares his mane, tail, and coat and sometimes eye colors with Felix, his mane, tail, and coat color with S06E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and his mane and tail with "Adante". Like "Package Deal", he is referred to as "Delivery Pony" in the end credits and voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1 and The Cutie Map - Part 2.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Tanks for the Memories. He shares his design with Caramel, Wensley, Cherry Fizzy, Golden Delicious, and Royal Riff. His cutie mark is a laurel wreath.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears ice-skating in Tanks for the Memories.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears, sometimes with a brown coat, as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, A Royal Problem, Sparkle's Seven, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears, sometimes with a brown coat, as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, Fame and Misfortune, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Last Crusade, The Summer Sun Setback, She Talks to Angel, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. His cutie mark is sometimes an red ascot and other times a guitar.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Resembles "Cormano". His cutie mark is two cherries.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. First appeared in the My Little Pony First Look and Find book, with slightly different tail and mane and eye colors. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Caramel, Upper East Stride, "Strawberry Cream", "Sour Drops", and S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is three blue horseshoes.

characters.name:
Jokester Clownspony
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. In Three's A Crowd, an otherwise unidentified stallion whose muzzle shape and coat and eye colors match Red Delicious, Goldengrape, "Fuzzy Slippers", S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9, and "Harry Trotter" equally makes a brief appearance as a security team member during Glass of Water. S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9 shares his coat and eye colors with Red Delicious, Goldengrape, "Wisp", S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, "Harry Trotter", and Strike. He is a character called "Jokester Clownspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "Saddle up and get ready for the show to start, because Jokester Clownspony knows the way to your heart!"

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. His cutie mark is a beach ball.

characters.name:
Lassoing Clownspony
S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and eye color with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #14 and his structure and eye color with Big Daddy McColt and Short Fuse. His cutie mark is three water balloons. He is a character called "Lassoing Clownspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "With big purple hair and a heart that's true, if you need a friend... you need Lassoing Clownspony!"

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with Meadow Song, his color scheme and cutie mark with "Oregon Trail", and his cutie mark with S04E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. His cutie mark is a wheel.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #14
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and eye color with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, his structure and eye color with Big Daddy McColt and Short Fuse, and his color scheme with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #20. His cutie mark is three water balloons.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Meadow Song and sometimes S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17. His cutie mark appears to be a guitar. Not to be confused with Noteworthy.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #16
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Goldengrape, his design, coat color, and cutie mark with S05E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Neigh Sayer, his design and coat and eye colors with S05E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his design and cutie mark with Don Neigh. His cutie mark is two bunches of green grapes.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares sometimes his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Meadow Song and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15 and other times his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat design with Noteworthy. His cutie mark is sometimes a guitar and other times appears to be two pairs of backwards-facing eighth notes.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #21
characters.description: Appears as a rodeo school judge in Trouble Shoes' flashback in the present in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his body type with Claude, Stinky Bottom, "Leadnail McColt", S06E03 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, "Port Wine", Coriander Cumin, "Mint Condition", and Cattail.

characters.name:
Jigging Clownspony
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #22
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. He is a character called "Jigging Clownspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "This proud pony prances perfectly -- but it's his jig you've really gotta see!"

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #24
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his design with "Beuford". His cutie mark is three gold bits.

characters.name:
Announcer
S05E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears twice as a guest announcer for the Grand Galloping Gala in Make New Friends but Keep Discord. Voiced by Tabitha St. Germain.

characters.name: S05E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears as a guest at the Grand Galloping Gala in Make New Friends but Keep Discord.

characters.name: S05E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Slice of Life when DJ Pon-3 and Octavia Melody race to town hall on a mobile DJ booth. Shares his design, coat color, and cutie mark with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #16, his design and cutie mark with Goldengrape, Neigh Sayer, and Don Neigh, and his design and coat color with S05E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. His cutie mark is two bunches of green grapes.

characters.name: S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears as one of the Grand Equestria Pony Summit delegates in Princess Spike. His cutie mark is a bowl of salad.

characters.name:
Annoyed Delegate
S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears as one of the Grand Equestria Pony Summit delegates in Princess Spike, Synergy: A Hasbro Creators Showcase's The Stage portrayal of which depicts him with different colors and clothing. Also appears in A Royal Problem. His cutie mark is a raincloud. Voiced by Terry Klassen.

characters.name: S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears at the Grand Equestria Pony Summit in Princess Spike. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Caramel, Upper East Stride, "Strawberry Cream", "Sour Drops", and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8. His cutie mark is three blue horseshoes.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Resembles Sonny Liston on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles a wax model of Ringo Starr on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles someone​[​specify​]​ on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles Tom Mix on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles someone​[​specify​]​ on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles David Livingstone on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles Stan Laurel on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles someone​[​specify​]​ on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles Oliver Hardy on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles someone​[​specify​]​ on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in the Canterlot library in Amending Fences. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with Lucky Clover and S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, his design and eye color with Dr. Hooves, and his cutie mark with "Sunny Song". His cutie mark is a microphone and musical notes.

characters.name: S05E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in the Canterlot library in Amending Fences. Shares his design and coat and eye colors with Upper East Stride, his design and eye color with Caramel, and his design with Cherry Fizzy and S01E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, and The Saddle Row Review as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Made in Manehattan as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his coat and mane colors with Royal Riff.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, The Saddle Row Review, Fake It 'Til You Make It, and Daring Doubt and in Las Pegasus in Viva Las Pegasus and Grannies Gone Wild. Represents Hasbro executive director Brian Lenard. His cutie mark is a vinyl record and two eighth notes.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan, on a friendly blind date with "Orange Sherbet" in The Gift of the Maud Pie, and in Daring Doubt. Represents Michael Vogel, who liked a fan's September 27, 2015 Twitter reply of the pony's full name being "Banana von Tooningham". His cutie mark is three bananas.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, and an animated Today Show video. In late September 2015, Jim Miller was asked "This guy was a 4chan cup shoutout I guess? pic.twitter.com/dR7OITvtRF" and answered "Nope! But I could see how you'd think so." His cutie mark is a soccer ball.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan. Bears a resemblance to Charlie Brown; see also BGE Unnamed Earth Colt #1 and Issue 23 Unnamed Colt - Charlie Brown. His cutie mark is an American football.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan as a cabbie in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is a wooden wheel.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears in a photo album in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is three carrots.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears in a photo album in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is a bowl and two mixing spoons.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, and The Saddle Row Review. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune, Grannies Gone Wild, and Daring Doubt. Listed within "More Manehattan Ponies" in the Ultimate Guide published by Orchard Books in the United Kingdom. In early April 2016, Mike P. Fox was asked "Who's[sic] idea was it for a Mr. Plinkett pony? Written in, or @TheBiggestJim 's[sic] team? pic.twitter.com/RgoCxtNAVt" and Jim Miller answered "I have no idea what you're talking about (also, that pony first appeared in 'Made in Manehattan' in S5) 😉". Shares his body style and eye color with Rogue, "Real Article", and "Wylin Slobinzki". His cutie mark appears to be three pizza rolls. Voiced by Michael Dobson.

characters.name:
Booth Barker
S05E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Brotherhooves Social as an announcer at the Sisterhooves Social. His cutie mark is a megaphone. Voiced by Peter New.

characters.name:
Masked Stallion
S05E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Scare Master dressed as Jason Voorhees for Nightmare Night. Shares his color scheme with Noteworthy. He is a character called "Masked Stallion" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Nightmare Night at the Museum" event. He also has a story role in the event, in which he claims to be a character named Grayson Eddy.

characters.name: S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as a Camp Friendship campleader in Applejack's flashback. His cutie mark is a stopwatch.

characters.name:
Coloratura's Lyricist
S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as one of Coloratura's backup dancers. His cutie mark is a disco ball. He is a character called "Coloratura's Lyricist" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Coloratura's Breakdancer
S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as one of Coloratura's backup dancers. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. His cutie mark is a boombox. He is a character called "Coloratura's Breakdancer" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Coloratura's Choreographer
S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as one of Coloratura's backup dancers. His cutie mark is a yellow star with sunglasses. He is a character called "Coloratura's Choreographer" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "This pony is known for his cool choreography. It's 60 percent of his autobiography!"

characters.name:
Coloratura's Hype Pony
S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as one of Coloratura's backup dancers. Also appears in She's All Yak and My Little Pony Established 1983 "Punk Rock Dash!" His cutie mark is a pair of sunglasses. He is a character called "Coloratura's Hype Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Coloratura's Rocker
S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as one of Coloratura's backup dancers. Also appears in She's All Yak. His cutie mark is a boombox. He is a character called "Coloratura's Rocker" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S05E25 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1 in an alternate timeline where Equestria is at war with King Sombra. Shares his body style, eyebrows, and eye color with Biff, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his body style and eyebrows with "Quick Trim" and S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3.

characters.name: S05E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 2 in an alternate timeline ruled by Queen Chrysalis. Shares his design and coat and eye colors with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #16, his design and eye color with Goldengrape, his design and coat color with S05E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, his design with Noteworthy and Crusoe Palm, and his color scheme with Flash Sentry.

characters.name: S06E03 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S06E03 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in The Gift of the Maud Pie. Shares his body type with Claude, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #21, Stinky Bottom, "Leadnail McColt", "Port Wine", Coriander Cumin, "Mint Condition", and Cattail.

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in On Your Marks as a dance recital performer. Resembles Patrick Swayze in Dirty Dancing.

characters.name: S06E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Ponyville in No Second Prances and as a Pegasus with a different cutie mark in A Hearth's Warming Tail and My Little Pony Best Gift Ever. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 6. Shares his design, eye color, and sometimes cutie mark with Dr. Hooves and S01E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and has a similar color scheme to Warm Front, Tall Tale, and Unnamed Boy #12.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail during Hearth's Warming Eve Is Here Once Again. His cutie mark is two eighth notes.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". Also appears without a mustache in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever. Shares his mustache style with S06E08 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1. His cutie mark is a loaf of bread.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". His cutie mark—the same as that of S05E12 Unnamed Earth Mare #4—is a soda can and three gold bits.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". His cutie mark is three bells.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". His cutie mark is three bells.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". His cutie mark is three bells.

characters.name: S06E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears between Lavender Bloom and a squirrel in Manehattan in The Saddle Row Review. Shares his design and coat and mane and tail colors with Felix, his design and mane and tail color with "Adante", his design, usually eyes, and accessory design with Don Neigh, his mane and tail and coat color with M2 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his mane and tail style and cutie mark design with "Blue Bonnet". His cutie mark is a dark-colored horseshoe and a darker-colored horseshoe interlocked.

characters.name: S06E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Applejack's "Day" Off as a patron of the Ponyville Day Spa.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Viva Las Pegasus, Once Upon a Zeppelin, and Grannies Gone Wild. Shares his design and mane color with "Lapis Hauyne". His cutie mark is a pith helmet.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention cosplaying as Daring Do. Also appears in Daring Doubt. Voiced by Ian Hanlin in Daring Doubt.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention cosplaying as Dr. Caballeron.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Viva Las Pegasus, sometimes as a Pegasus in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever, and in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. His cutie mark is a mop.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention cosplaying as Ahuizotl. Shares his body style and eye color with Toe-Tapper and "Steer Straight".

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention.

characters.name:
Salespony
S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as a salespony at the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Viva Las Pegasus, Common Ground, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares his design with "Back Stage". His cutie mark is a yellow twelve-pointed star. Voiced by Colin Murdock. He is a character called "Salespony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Concierge Pony
S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as a convention hotel clerk. His cutie mark is a hotel key. He is a character called "Concierge Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "You want to see DARING DO!? Don't make him laugh! This pony is just the convention hall staff!"

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as a convention hotel bellhop. His cutie mark is a gold concierge bell.

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron. Also appears in Sparkle's Seven. His cutie mark is a heart wearing a fedora.

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a bass player in a swing band.

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a saxophone player in a swing band. His cutie mark is a saxophone.

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron dancing with "Betty Hoof". Also appears in Sparkle's Seven. His cutie mark is two crossed palm trees. [2]​[​specify​]​

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron. Also appears in Sparkle's Seven. His cutie mark is a rose. [3]​[​specify​]​

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron. Also appears in Sparkle's Seven as a bar patron in Rarity's fantasy sequence. Has the same body type and eye color as Trenderhoof, "Free Throw", and "Uptown Clover", the same body type as "Natural Deduction" and "Mustafa Combe", and a similar body type to "Sprig Hooffield", "Vermilion Spring", and Chancellor Neighsay. His cutie mark is a chalkboard and piece of white chalk. [4]​[​specify​]​

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron. Also appears in Sparkle's Seven. Shares his body style and eye color with Gladmane, "Joe Pescolt", "Burlap", S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6, and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. [5]​[​specify​]​

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a jazz club patron. Also appears in Sparkle's Seven.

characters.name: S06E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Buckball Season cheering for the Ponyville buckball team at the Ponyville train station. Also appears in Common Ground and 2, 4, 6, Greaaat.

characters.name:
Student 4
S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild, with a speaking role in Friendship University, in Common Ground, in Between Dark and Dawn, and in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares his cutie mark design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is a ringed planetoid. Voiced by Scott McNeil.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Common Ground, Student Counsel, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. His cutie mark is a mountain peak.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin, in Grannies Gone Wild, in The Point of No Return participating in a fruit fight at the Silver Stable Retirement Community, and in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8.

characters.name:
Barker/Carnival Barker
S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus as a barker pony at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and as a unicorn in Growing Up is Hard to Do. His cutie mark is a bullhorn. Voiced by Peter Kelamis.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. A representation of Devon Cody. Shares his design with S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11. His cutie mark is a whale.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Shares his design with S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10. His cutie mark is a tidal wave.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. His cutie mark is an anchor.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. His cutie mark is three fish.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Shares his design and eye color with S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin. His cutie mark is a starfish.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. His cutie mark is a red clam.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Shares his tail style and coat and mane colors with Comet Tail. His cutie mark is a tornado.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Shares his design with S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2, and has a a similar color scheme to Jet Set, Lucky Clover, and Felix. His cutie mark is a life preserver.

characters.name: S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: Appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. Shares his design with S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a taxi cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his cutie mark with Crafty Crate. His cutie mark is a crate.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a janitor at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor/surgeon at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a nurse pony at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name: S07E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Royal Problem as a Canterlot Castle servant. His cutie mark is several hors d'oeuvres.

characters.name: S07E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in A Royal Problem as a Canterlot Castle servant. His cutie mark is a feather duster.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in flashback in The Perfect Pear. His cutie mark is a string of leaves.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in flashback in The Perfect Pear. His cutie mark is an array of hoof-dance steps.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in flashback in The Perfect Pear as a member of the Pear family.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in flashback in The Perfect Pear as a member of the Pear family. His cutie mark is a pear and pie.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in flashback in The Perfect Pear. Shares his design and accessory design with Apple Cinnamon and "Adante" and his color scheme nearly with "High Roller" and S08E01 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3. His cutie mark is a guitar and three black double quavers.

characters.name: S07E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as an out-of-town pony from Fillydelphia getting Twilight Sparkle to autograph his copy of the published friendship journal. His cutie mark is a piece of milk toast. Either he or S07E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1 is not in Fame and Misfortune's locked script.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Rockhoof's village in Applejack's story.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Rockhoof's village in Applejack's story.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as an apple farmer in Rarity's story. His cutie mark is a seed sprout.

characters.name:
Grateful Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. He is a character called "Grateful Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Outdoorsy Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. He is a character named "Outdoorsy Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "This pony prefers earth tones--the better to blend in with the surrounding desert when he's out exploring."

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? up to thirty-six times at once as a servant of Prince Hisan in Somnambula's legend. His cutie mark is a red plant growth.

characters.name: S07E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You outside Mr. Breezy's fan store. His cutie mark is a paper fan.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. His cutie mark is three balloons.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. Shares his design with S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark is a volcano.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience wearing a Princess Cadance shirt. Shares his design with S08E14 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1 and his cutie mark design with S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. His cutie mark is a ringed planet.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Shadow Play - Part 2 as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Shadow Play - Part 2 as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades. Resembles Quasimodo in The Hunchback of Notre-Dame.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades.

characters.name: S08E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Grannies Gone Wild at Flim and Flam's Las Pegasus resort. Resembles Rick Sanchez from Rick and Morty. His cutie mark is a glass beaker.

characters.name: S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a passenger on the Friendship Express. Identical to Crusoe Palm in all but coat color and cutie mark, shares his design and eye color with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8 and his cutie mark with S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, and resembles Meadow Flower. His cutie mark is a sunflower.

characters.name: S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow.

characters.name:
Dapper Hollowvian
S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow. He is a character called "Dapper Hollowvian" in Gameloft's mobile game; his bio states, "We'd say he's bringing bowties back to Sire's Hollow -- but they never left in the first place."

characters.name: S08E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Non-Compete Clause as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design and coat color with "Vellum Codex".

characters.name:
Chill Friendship Student
S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, The Last Crusade, The Summer Sun Setback, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design and eye color with S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark is a popsicle. He is a character named "Chill Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "His roommate would REALLY appreciate it if he'd start practicing kindness by doing the dishes in his dorm kitchen once in a while."

characters.name:
Sandbar's Dad
S08E15 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as Sandbar's father in his story. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2. He is a character called "Sandbar's Dad" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "He doesn’t care what anyone else says: HE thinks his son’s story about how his Hearth’s Warming doll almost fell into the fire is GREAT." His cutie mark is a fish.

characters.name:
Tall Pony
S08E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Road to Friendship as an innkeeper in Somnambula. Shares his body type and eye color with "Turner McColt", Dandy Grandeur, "Snow Hope", and BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his body type with Cheese Sandwich, "Mules Grassfield", and Mudbriar. He is a character named "Tall Innkeeper" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "His height makes it easier for him to see all the ponies waiting in line to book a room. It's usually a lot!" Voiced by Kathleen Barr.

characters.name: BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever eating ice cream outside Carousel Boutique. His cutie mark is an ice cream cone.

characters.name:
Pony Vendor 1
BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever running from Smoky and selling sewing machines. He is a character called "Northerly Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game; his bio states, "Raised in the frozen North by an adoptive family, this innocent young stallion isn't used to the hustle and bustle -- and raccoons -- of Ponyville." Shares his body type and eye color with "Turner McColt", Dandy Grandeur, "Snow Hope", and S08E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and his body type with Cheese Sandwich, "Mules Grassfield", and Mudbriar. Resembles Buddy the Elf from the film Elf; not to be confused with Buddy. Voiced by Sam Vincent.

characters.name:
Server Pony
S09E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Sparkle's Seven as a bartender in Rarity's fantasy sequence. Voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name:
Meathead Pony
S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return living in Dusty Pages' old house. His cutie mark is three red dumbbells. Voiced by Paul Dobson.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return mining in a silver mane. Shares his mane and eye color with Meadow Song.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return participating in a theatre performance at the Silver Stable Retirement Community.

characters.name: S09E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Common Ground competing in the Appleloosa buckball tournament. His cutie mark is three candies.

characters.name:
Guard Pony 1
S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as one of the security guards at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Voiced by Jesse Inocalla.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name:
Factory Pony
S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as one of the security guards at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Voiced.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Resembles Apple Cinnamon.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do during Being Big is All It Takes. Shares his body design with S06E20 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do operating the Ferris wheel at the Appleloosa County Fair. Shares his body model with Gizmo, "Burdock Hooffield", "Street Rat", "Spiral Notepad", and "Ginger Locks". His cutie mark is a cracked cogwheel.

characters.name:
Fruit Seller
S09E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: A Canterlot fruit seller in The Ending of the End - Part 1. Voiced by Nicole Oliver.

characters.name:
Baker Pony
S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a baker during Twilight Sparkle's coronation ceremony. He is a character named "Canterlot Baker" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during "The Pinkie Parents Problem" event. His bio states "We bet he and Joe swap fancy donut recipes all the time." Voiced by Peter New.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Ponyville. Shares his design and eye color with S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and his design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark appears to be two lollipops.

characters.name:
Future-Looking Friendship Student
S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future student at the School of Friendship. He is a character named "Future-Looking Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future Part Two" event. His in-game bio states "The School of Friendship's future student body counts creatures of all kinds--including ponies with an eye on generations yet to come."
